rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND ((2 AND 3) OR (4 AND 5) OR (6 AND 7) OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12)) AND 13

rules.description: Automatic check to flag Spec as Standard before manual Standard Assessment.
rules.formula: (ISCHANGED( submitForApproval__c ) && submitForApproval__c = True) && ISBLANK(Innovation_Type__c) && ((ISPICKVAL(marketSegment__c,'Handheld (Phone)') && (length__c >=25.4 && length__c < 170) && (width__c >=25.4 && width__c < 95)) || ((ISPICKVAL(marketSegment__c,'Notebook') || ISPICKVAL(marketSegment__c,'Tablet') || ISPICKVAL(marketSegment__c,'AIO (desktop)')) && (length__c >=170 && length__c < 500) && (width__c >=95 && width__c < 500))) && ((thickness__c = 0.4) || (thickness__c = 0.5) || (thickness__c = 0.55) || (thickness__c = 0.7) || (thickness__c = 0.85) || (thickness__c = 1.0) || (thickness__c = 1.3)) && (ISPICKVAL(glassComposition__c,'2320') || ISPICKVAL(glassComposition__c,'5318') || ISPICKVAL(glassComposition__c,'7321')) && (ISPICKVAL(specialShapes__c ,'2D') || ISPICKVAL(specialShapes__c,'2.5D')) && numberOfSlots__c <= 2 && numberOfHoles__c <= 2 && NOT(ISPICKVAL(screenPrint__c,'Special Request')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(screenPrintColors__c,'Special Requirements'))

rules.description: Sets specification name to be the formula field

criteriaItems.value: Parts,Parts - Final,Parts - Submitted,Parts - RFI,Parts - RFI Final,Parts - RFI Submitted
Parts,Parts - Final,Parts - Submitted,Parts - RFI,Parts - RFI Final,Parts - RFI Submitted

rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6) OR (1 AND 6 AND 7)
(1 AND 2 AND 3) OR (4 AND 5) OR (6 AND 7 AND 8)

rules.fullName: Submit for Initial Business Case Review
rules.description: Specification submitted for initial business case review

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
(((1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4) AND 10) OR ((1 OR 16) AND 5 AND 6 AND 11) OR ((1 OR 16) AND (7 OR 8 OR 9) AND 12) OR ((1 OR 16) AND 13 AND 14)) and 15) OR (18 AND 17 AND 16 AND 15)
(1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (1 AND 5 AND (6 OR 7)) OR (1 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10)
